meanings.definition: The quality of being skillful or clever with one's hands.
meanings.sent1: Her handiness in knitting allowed her to create beautiful scarves for her friends.
meanings.sent2: His handiness in fixing things around the house saved them a lot of money on repairs.
meanings.sent3: The magician's handiness with cards amazed the audience as he performed his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The artist's handiness with a brush turned a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef's handiness in the kitchen made cooking look effortless and fun.

meanings.definition: The convenience or usefulness of something.
meanings.sent1: The handiness of having a grocery store nearby made shopping for ingredients easy.
meanings.sent2: The handiness of a smartphone allows us to stay connected wherever we go.
meanings.sent3: The handiness of a pocket-sized umbrella saved her from getting wet in the sudden rain.
meanings.sent4: The handiness of a multi-tool with various functions is a must-have for outdoor activities.
meanings.sent5: The handiness of a remote control makes changing channels effortless from the comfort of the couch.

meanings.definition: The state of being readily accessible or available.
meanings.sent1: The handiness of having a bus stop right outside their house made commuting convenient.
meanings.sent2: The handiness of online shopping allows you to buy items without leaving your home.
meanings.sent3: The handiness of a vending machine in the office provides quick snacks during breaks.
meanings.sent4: The handiness of a digital library gives instant access to a wide range of books.
meanings.sent5: The handiness of a 24-hour convenience store ensures you can buy essentials at any time.
